SEARCH
Package de.fherfurt.lat.storage.data.daos

Klasse JpaGenericDao<T extends AbstractDatabaseEntity>

java.lang.Object
de.fherfurt.lat.storage.data.daos.JpaGenericDao<T>
Typparameter:
T - the type of entity managed by this DAO, which must extend AbstractDatabaseEntity.
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
IGenericDao<T>
public class JpaGenericDao<T extends AbstractDatabaseEntity> extends Object implements IGenericDao<T>
Implementation of the IGenericDao interface using JPA (Java Persistence API).

This class provides generic DAO operations for entities extending AbstractDatabaseEntity. It uses JPA's EntityManager for performing CRUD operations and transactions.
